Package comp3111.covid.dataAnalysis

Class DateConverter

java.lang.Object
comp3111.covid.dataAnalysis.DateConverter
public class DateConverter
extends java.lang.Object
A Converter that allow conversion between LocalDate objects, long value and String objects mainly for the conversion between the return value of UI elements (such as slider) to an object for internal use. This class is under the singleton restriction under the Context class.
See Also:
Context

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    DateConverter()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    long dateToLong​(java.time.LocalDate date)
    This method returns the difference between the parameter date and the anchor point DateConverter#START_DATE The difference is represented in the number of days
    java.time.LocalDate longToDate​(long dateValue)
    This method returns resultant date of adding number of days in the parameter to the anchor point START_DATE
    java.lang.String longToString​(long dateValue)
    This method returns the long-value representation of a date into a String of iso-format date.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • DateConverter

      public DateConverter()

  • Method Details

    • dateToLong

      public long dateToLong​(java.time.LocalDate date)
      This method returns the difference between the parameter date and the anchor point DateConverter#START_DATE The difference is represented in the number of days
      Parameters:
      date - the date to transform into long value
      Returns:
      days elapsed since START_DATE to specified date

    • longToDate

      public java.time.LocalDate longToDate​(long dateValue)
      This method returns resultant date of adding number of days in the parameter to the anchor point START_DATE
      Parameters:
      dateValue - the number of days to add to START_DATE
      Returns:
      the the date of the specified number of days added to START_DATE

    • longToString

      public java.lang.String longToString​(long dateValue)
      This method returns the long-value representation of a date into a String of iso-format date. Mainly used by text converters of UI elements.
      Parameters:
      dateValue - the long-value representation to convert to string
      Returns:
      a string of iso-format date represented by the specified long value
